Patent Title: COMPOSITIONS AND METHODS FOR TREATING OR PREVENTING EOSINOPHILIC ESOPHAGITIS AND OTHER EOSINOPHILIC GASTROINTESTINAL DISEASES
target_antigen: Proinflammatory cytokines are TNF-α, interleukins IL-4, IL-5, IL-9, IL-13, IL-15, IL-33, thymic stromal lymphopoietin (TSLP), and 10 transforming growth factor beta (TGF-β). Chemoattractants include members of the CC chemokine family, eotaxin-1, eotaxin-2, eotaxin-3, CCL3, and CCL5. Cell adhesion molecules (CAMs), such as VCAM-1, ICAM-1, integrin α4β7, cadherin 26, and VLA-4

target_antigen: Snake venom (multiople antigens, as Snake venom contains several proteins that cause a variety membrane damages that resuklt in necrosis of tissue.
